Paragraph: A 7 - year - old girl with an unusual reaction to induction chemotherapy for precursor B - cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) is described .

Note: I have included both the "unusual reaction to induction chemotherapy" and "precursor B - cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)" as "Disease" entities, as they both relate to medical conditions. The "unusual reaction" is a specific reaction to the chemotherapy treatment, and "precursor B - cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)" is a specific type of cancer.

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A 7 - year - old girl with an unusual reaction to induction chemotherapy for precursor B - cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) is described .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| induction chemotherapy |
| precursor B - cell |
| acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) |

Explanation:

1. "induction chemotherapy" is a chemical treatment that uses drugs to kill cancer cells.
2. "precursor B - cell" is a type of cell that can develop into a type of white blood cell called a B lymphocyte, which is a type of immune cell.
3. "acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)" is a type of cancer that affects the white blood cells, specifically the lymphoblasts, which are immature white blood cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| induction chemotherapy |

Explanation:

1. "induction chemotherapy" is a chemical treatment that uses drugs to kill cancer cells.

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "7-year-old girl," "unusual reaction," "precursor B-cell," and "acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)," do not clearly refer to "Chemical" entities.
